WorkItem.Description:
It would be really nice to have mature example for Integration WPF controls to WinForms project.
Thank you.

Comments.Message:
Hi Molastudio,

   Thanks for using our project service.

   The issue that you provided has been mentioned by MSDN forum thread. You can refer to the follow link to get more additional information about it.

http://social.msdn.microsoft.com/Forums/en-US/wpf/thread/bf2bd138-7f8c-4355-ab4e-544551d20c32

  Is it your wanted problem? If you have the additional information about how to embed the winform control into WPF program. Please feel free to let me know.

Thanks
All-In-Onecode Framework

Hi Molastudio,
